doc:
Bonnie Bartlett https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonnie_Bartlett 0 Bonnie Bartlett (born June 20, 1929) is an American television and film actress. Her career spans over 60 years, with her first major role being on a 1950s daytime drama, Love of Life. She is best known for her role as Ellen Craig on the medical drama series St. Elsewhere. She and her husband, actor William Daniels, who played her fictional husband Dr. Mark Craig, won the 1986 Emmy Awards on the same night, becoming the first married couple to accomplish the feat since Alfred Lunt and Lynn Fontanne in 1965. Bonnie_Bartlett ( born June_20_,_1929 ) is an_American_television_and_film_actress . Her_career spans over_60_years , with her_first_major_role being on a_1950s_daytime_drama , Love of Life . She is_best_known for her_role as Ellen_Craig on the_medical_drama_series_St. Elsewhere . She and her_husband , actor_William_Daniels , who played her_fictional_husband_Dr._Mark_Craig , won the_1986_Emmy_Awards on the_same_night , becoming the_first_married_couple to_accomplish the_feat since Alfred_Lunt and Lynn_Fontanne in 1965 .
